share-email: Link name and alt value for 'Share via email'
share-email-desc: i18n counterpart of message in extension.json
share-facebook: Link name and alt value for 'Share to Facebook'
share-facebook-desc: i18n counterpart of message in extension.json
share-linkedin: Link name and alt value for 'Share to LinkedIn'
share-linkedin-desc: i18n counterpart of message in extension.json
share-reddit: Link name and alt value for 'Share to Reddit'
share-reddit-desc: i18n counterpart of message in extension.json
share-sidebar-basicbuttons: i18n counterpart of message in extension.json
share-sidebar-plainlinks: i18n counterpart of message in extension.json
share-tumblr: Link name and alt value for 'Share to Tumblr'
share-tumblr-desc: i18n counterpart of message in extension.json
share-twitter: Link name and alt value for 'Share to Twitter'
share-twitter-desc: i18n counterpart of message in extension.json
share-preftoggle: Toggle to allow users to enable or disable the sidebar portlet in their user preferences
